channel.title: [Class Idea] The Thief
channel.description:
Thief Neutral Special
Objective: Use 3 stolen night abilities
Passive: Secret Stash When executed, everyone gains 1 more use to all their abilities. If killed through other means only the one who killed him gets 1 more use to their abilities.
Day Ability 1: Pickpocket (3 uses) Makes the 1st day ability from the player you target your second day ability, this ability has 1 use. If targeting the Cult Leader, their 2nd ability will become your 1st ability instead. Does not work on the King, Prince, or Mastermind.
Night Ability 1: Burglarize (Unlimited uses) Makes the 1st night ability from the player you visit your second night ability, this ability has 1 use. Does not work on the King, Prince, Mastermind, or Cult Leader.
